title: Canyon Lux Trail ‘downcountry’ bike gets new front triangle, slacker geo & more travel
content:
Light, fast, and capable. That’s the Canyon Lux Trail in a nutshell, at least according to Canyon themselves. Modern XC mountain bikes are certainly capable, especially when compared to older machines, but downcountry bikes? Those are in another league when it comes to capability.
